    Hi there, and welcome to my personal website! My name’s Nishanth and I’m an AI + Robotics researcher and software engineer that doubles as an author and entrepreneur in my spare time.

    Presently, I’m a Junior at Brown University who’s officially concentrating in Computer Engineering and researching AI within the Computer Science department, but unofficially does everything from novel writing to promoting undergrad research within the CS department. In the past, I’ve helped develop and run Brown’s Graduate-Level Reinforcement Learning course, launched high-altitude balloons with Brown Space Engineering and even served as a Science Tour Guide. Outside of CS and Engineering, I run a coaching and college-counseling company for high-school students and sometimes try to make progress on a young-adult sci-fi novel I’ve been writing for the last 6 years (that will hopefully be done someday…).

    I grew up playing street-cricket and learning to love Dosa in Coimbatore, India. During my time in India, I studied and eventually taught the IB, played a ton of basketball, wrote and semi self-published a novel, built and competed with robots, interned at a startup accelerator, and even built a popular science fair project.

    If you’re interested in reaching out or learning more about me, check out my social links in the website footer. If you’d like me to respond directly, I’m probably most available by email. I always love meeting new people and discussing, collaborating or advising in any way I can, so don’t hesitate to contact!

    Recent News

    • Starting next semester I’ll be an MURA with Brown CS, working to encourage undergrad research within the department!
    • My company, Paragon.school, is accepting applications from new students! If you’re an ambitious high-school student looking to improve your grades, time-management, extra-curriculars and college application, consider applying.
    • I was at AAAI 2020! I had a blast attending the Undergrad Consortium, presenting my Student Abstract and meeting amazing people.
    • I’ve accepted a summer internship at Uber ATG Research! From May to August 2020, I’ll be in Toronto working with Prof. Raquel Urtasun doing research to make safe Self-Driving Vehicles a reality!
    • I received an Honorable Mention for the CRA Outstanding Undergrad Research Award!
